item.description:
Week 2 of the Kaleidoscope Series sponsored by Bay Path College.

This event is FREE!

Tuesday, October 4th, 7:00PM

Speakers: Suzanne Larocque, Owner Sleaque Images
Christine Burns, Owner of Clowntique

Being a woman (or man) in business means balancing your career and your family life and having the time to do it! Hear from two women who manage to make time work for them while paying the bills, taking pets to the vet, getting the kids to soccer, networking at business functions, and staying sane through it all!
item.name: CREATING TIME SAVING SYSTEMS & THE ART OF WORK/LIFE BALANCE
